content: Hey, I was looking at the roadmap, and I'd like to volunteer to be marked as a "key participant" on the "Sync and async behave the same" initiative.
Not sure what the process is to be marked as that, but I assume it starts by posting here?
Awesome! Speaking of which, I'd love to have your feedback on https://github.com/rust-lang/wg-async/pull/268. I just added you as a reviewer.

Your PR looks good to me! I'm definitely happy to list you as a key participant for Sync and Async Behave the Same under Polish. For the Async Overloading one, I'm not sure if @tmandry or @nikomatsakis are supposed to chime in since that's a top level roadmap goal.

eholk said:

Awesome! Speaking of which, I'd love to have your feedback on https://github.com/rust-lang/wg-async/pull/268. I just added you as a reviewer.

yess, reviewed!
